assistants.name: This is the assistant name - MANDATORY
assistants.description: This is the assistant description - MANDATORY
assistants.instructions_text: This is the assistant instructions in text directly in the assistant json, if this is present, the instructions_path will be ignored - MANDATORY
prompt_starters_text: This is the text for aprompt starter directly in the assistant json. It can be combined with the prompt_starters_path

assistant_files.description: This is the file description for the file that the assistant will see and use to determine the data it will used when it processes user queries.

assistants.ui_url: http://localhost:5173/ # if this is present, the ui_info will be ignored
